title: A short but cleare discovrse of the institiution, dignity, and end of the Lords-day upon occasion of those words of St. Iohn ... / written by George Hakewill ...
author: Hakewill, George, 1578-1649.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Raworth for George Thomason and Octavian Pullen,
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
